definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: For differentiating bacteria based on liquefaction of gelation.
sentences.chinese: 供鉴别细菌液化明胶用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the hemostatic effect of gelatin fleece (GF) on different traumatic bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨明胶纤维网在不同出血创面的止血效果。

sentences.english: Splenic embolization in treatment of hypersplenism using both silk threads and gelfoam.
sentences.chinese: 丝线加明胶海绵脾脏栓塞治疗脾功能亢进。

sentences.english: Conclusions Establishment of cerebral infarction model by gelfoam embolization is practical.
sentences.chinese: 结论用明胶海绵栓塞颈内动脉制作脑梗塞模型可行。

sentences.english: Chosing modified protein gelatin and blended with chitosan.
sentences.chinese: 选择变性蛋白质明胶与甲壳胺共混。

sentences.english: It shows that there may be many kinds of ligands combined with calcium in gelatin.
sentences.chinese: 并指出明胶中可能存在多种钙的结合配体。

sentences.english: The paint was covered by salt crystals and gelatin glue.
sentences.chinese: 可是因为该幅作品被晶体盐和明胶覆盖。

sentences.english: We dont accept parcels sealed with Scotch tape.
sentences.chinese: 我们不接受用透明胶封口的包裹。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Vegetable Oil, Gelatin, Glycerin, Yellow Beeswax, Soy Lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 动物油，明胶，甘油，黄蜂蜡，大豆卵磷脂。

sentences.english: The authors used gelfoam and stainless steel coils to achiee arterial occlusion.
sentences.chinese: 他们利用可吸收明胶海绵和不锈钢钢圈来阻塞动脉。

sentences.english: The gelatin group had less biological lesions than the control group.
sentences.chinese: 白明胶组的某些生化损伤较对照组为轻。

sentences.english: It forms a clear gel which will not retrograde on stand.
sentences.chinese: 形成一种透明胶，静置时该胶不会退化。

sentences.english: The clear plastic reservoir makes it easy to monitor seed levels.
sentences.chinese: 透明胶水库可以方便地监测种子水平。

sentences.english: Yoghurts Some low fat yoghurts contain gelatine .
sentences.chinese: 酸奶一些低脂肪酸奶含有明胶。

sentences.english: Copy to the watercolor paper and stick it to the drawing board with sellotape .
sentences.chinese: 拷贝到水彩纸上的线稿并用透明胶纸固定在画板上。

sentences.english: Precipitation additives such as nitrocellulose or gelatin can usefully be employed.
sentences.chinese: 可有利地使用沉淀添加剂例如硝化纤维素或明胶。

definition: xanthan/xanthanate gum (polysaccharide food additive used as a thickener)
